name: omg-lol
title: Omg.lol
description: Create, read, and update data in your omg.lol account.
author: danpalmer

commands.name: create-paste
commands.title: Create Paste
commands.description: Create a new paste in your omg.lol pastebin with a given title and content.

commands.name: create-paste-clipboard
commands.title: Create Paste From Clipboard
commands.description: Create a new paste in your omg.lol pastebin with the current clipboard content and a random title.

commands.name: view-pastebin
commands.title: View Pastebin
commands.description: View items in your omg.lol pastebin, and copy or delete them.

commands.name: create-purl
commands.title: Create PURL
commands.description: Create a new PURL in your omg.lol account.

commands.name: view-purls
commands.title: View PURLs
commands.description: View PURLs in your omg.lol account.

preferences.name: username
preferences.title: Override username
preferences.description: The omg.lol account name to use. If not specified, the earliest name in your omg.lol account will be used.
